articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold 7: $1120 Off
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is offering a substantial discount on the Galaxy Z Fold 7, with potential savings up to $1,120 through trade-ins and storage upgrades. The Z Fold 7 features an improved camera system, refined hardware, and smooth software, positioning it as a compelling alternative to traditional smartphones and addressing previous durability concerns.

articles.title: 46 Things Reviewers Buy Over And Over Again, So They're Worth The Investment
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream. Eos launched Shea Butter Pomegranate Raspberry Body Lotion. Nivea released skin-firming gel cream. Lottabody launched Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse. Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. Good Molecules launched Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel. Elizavecca launched a hair treatment. Anua launched heartleaf pore-clearing cleansing oil. Cremo launched Baccarat Rouge 540â€“inspired Body Wash. E.l.f. launched Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops.

articles.title: Major household brand sold in Tesco and Waitrose launches first EVER haircare range
articles.author: Laura McGuire
articles.summary: Method, known for its eco-friendly cleaning products, has launched a new line of haircare products. The range includes three different shampoos and conditioners, each formulated without sulphates, parabens, silicones or dyes. The products will be available at Waitrose and Amazon for Â£6.50 per bottle.

articles.title: This Toilet Fix Was Nothing Like I Expected-Here's Why
articles.author: Kelly Bryant
articles.summary: Green Gobbler introduced a liquid toilet plunger priced at $10.99. Initial tests showed limited success after 30 minutes, but after sitting for three hours, it effectively unclogged a toilet. The product offers an easier, less messy alternative to traditional plungers.

articles.title: 27 "Most Wished For" Products From Amazon
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: Amazon showcases a selection of "Most Wished For" products including a Summer Fridays tinted lip balm, Nivea gel cream, and a Disney princess-themed Owala water bottle. Also highlighted are cleaning products like pumpkin spice Dawn Powerwash and Shadazzle eco-friendly cleaner, alongside entertainment items such as Grab The Mic and a Ninja Swirl by Creami ice cream maker.

articles.title: Saudi Water Authority launches delivery for gigaprojects
articles.author: Arab News
articles.summary: Saudi Water Authority launched a new electronic service on its digital platform for giga development project customers, allowing them to apply for water and sanitation services. This initiative streamlines procedures, standardizes applications, and coordinates with water sector agencies to ensure timely processing, supporting sustainability, innovation, and easier access to services.

articles.title: Frozen yoghurt chain Frurt opening in Friargate
articles.author: Megan Bainbridge Reporter
articles.summary: Frozen yogurt brand Frurt is launching its newest and largest UK store in Preston this October, marking its 12th UK location. The new store will operate as a full-service site, serving rotating flavors, including vegan options, and will expand beyond yogurt to feature protein and energy balls and fresh juices.

articles.title: 50 Things To Transform Your Scary Bathroom
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Several new cleaning and home improvement products are introduced. Bioclean is a hard water stain remover, while an impressive foaming drain cleaner is highlighted. The Pink Stuff is introduced as a cleaning paste for sticky messes. Furthermore, an EasyWring microfiber spin mop is presented as a solution for floor cleaning, and a fully wireless, rechargeable stick-on "Poplight" sconce featured on Shark Tank is launched.

articles.title: The Pros and Cons of Using AI Logos for Startups and Entrepreneurs
articles.author: Neel Achary
articles.summary: AI logo generators offer a fast and affordable solution for startups to create visual identities quickly. These tools provide flexibility in modifying designs, but users should be mindful of originality, licensing, and emotional connection. Startups can maximize the benefits of AI design by using it for initial exploration and then refining the results with human judgment.

articles.title: Domain and Hosting Signup PHP Software plus Hosting Template = $25 /one time fee
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: domainCart is introduced as a domain name and web hosting order PHP script. It features a domain availability checker with WHOIS, RDAP, DNS, and Registrar API integration. The script also offers multi-TLD search, an AI domain suggestion tool, multi-coupon code support, 25+ payment options with multi-currency, and a shopping cart for domain and hosting services with one-page checkout.

articles.title: 'Bewdy' Created For Today's Beauty Lovers Who Want Authenticity â€“Bibi Olunuga
articles.author: New Telegraph-Admin
articles.summary: Bewdy, a new mobile application, has launched in Nigeria to transform access to beauty services. The platform aims to provide convenience and authenticity for beauty lovers, while also offering visibility and growth for beauty professionals. The app facilitates discovery, booking, and payments within a single platform.

articles.title: VAPORESSO Launches XROS PRO 2 at InterTabac 2025, Redefining the Flagship Standard
articles.author: VAPORESSO
articles.summary: VAPORESSO introduced its latest product, the XROS PRO 2, at InterTabac 2025. This launch signifies an upgrade to the XROS PRO line and emphasizes the brand's ambition to establish new standards in endurance, design, and flavor within the vaping device market.

articles.title: This Unique Washing Machine Design May Just Be The Future Of Laundry
articles.author: Lauren La More
articles.summary: Haier, Hisense, and Xiaomi announced or released three-drum washing machines, allowing multiple cycles with different settings. Haier's machine was announced for presale on March 15, 2025, while Hisense unveiled its version on March 21, 2025, and Xiaomi showed off its three-zone machine in September. LG offers the SideKick and Samsung offers the FlexWash as two-drum alternatives.

articles.title: Shark steam mop leaves users 'amazed at how clean their floors look' - it's now Â£30 off
articles.author: Kerri Ann Roper
articles.summary: The Shark SteamSpot with Steam Blaster Technology for Hard Floors is available on Amazon for Â£67.99, a 32% discount from its original price. It features three steam modes and is suitable for various sealed hard floors. The Dyson WashG1 wet floor cleaner is also mentioned, priced at Â£449.99, as well as the Argos Home Mop and Bucket Set for Â£14.

articles.title: Shoppers ditch mop and bucket for 'streak-free' steamer amid Â£35 price slash
articles.author: Eilidh Farquhar
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Shark SteamSpot with Steam Blaster at a discounted price of Â£65.99, featuring steam blaster technology and reusable dirt grip pads. The steamer has three cleaning modes and has received positive reviews for its cleaning performance. The article also mentions price drops for Vax Steam Fresh Home and Philips OneUP 3000 Electric Mop.

articles.title: Make your living room smell like Â£74 Gucci perfume with Aldi's Â£6.99 dupe that's â€˜identical' to real thing
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Aldi is launching new products, including the Lacura Eau de Parfum range priced at Â£6.99, with scents like Bouquet Blush being compared to Gucci Flora.  Additionally, Aldi offers affordable alternatives to high-end beauty products, such as the Lacura Healthy Glow Exfoliating Tonic (dupe for Pixi Glow Tonic) and Lacura Caviar Illumination Day Cream (dupe for La Prairie Skin Caviar Luxe Cream).

articles.title: 43 TikTok-Beloved Products You'll Enjoy Using An Almost Embarrassing Amount
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder for oil absorption and pore blurring. Lottabody launched Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse for hydrated, volumized curls. Gold Bond released firming neck and chest cream containing aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. EOS launched Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment. McCormick introduced Potato Topping Seasoning with salt, garlic, and asiago cheese. Lumify launched Eye Drops for instant redness reduction. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. E.l.f launched Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara for thin or fragile lashes. Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener for dark circles. Good Molecules launched Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel to minimize eye puffiness. The Pink Stuff released "Sqeezy" sponge set for cleaning projects. Death Wish launched Instant Coffee Packets with 300 mg caffeine per cup. Clinique launched Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey. Coop Home Goods launched pillow designed for side, back, and stomach sleepers. Oxo launched compact Cold Brew Rapid Brewer to make cold brew in FIVE MINUTES.

articles.title: FullThrottle Launches AI-Powered Advertising Platform for Small and Mid-Sized Businesses
articles.author: Timothy Alexander
articles.summary: FullThrottle Technologies, LLC has launched a new version of its fullthrottle.aiÂ® platform, designed for small and mid-sized businesses (SMBs). The AI-driven platform consolidates campaign planning, omnichannel activation, and real-time outcome measurement. It aims to improve audience match rates and provide closed-loop attribution, linking ad exposure to sales.

articles.title: Get crafty with a kid-friendly 3D printer deal for the holiday gifting season
articles.author: Jessie Quinn
articles.summary: Toybox has introduced a new 3D printer designed for ease of use, featuring one-touch functions and an app-controlled interface. The printer is preloaded with thousands of toy designs and allows users to upload their own models, promoting independent creation.

articles.title: ðŸŒ± Patch AM: Cromwell-Portland narrowly defeats North Branford in a thrilling game
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to improve its network, and is now recognized as America's best mobile network in the US according to Ookla Speedtest. This investment supports communities by helping to keep them connected.

articles.title: I'm a Mom of 2 â€” These Toddler & Baby Products Make my Life Easier
articles.author: Brooke L Sager
articles.summary: Honest brand enhanced their diaper design based on customer feedback for better leak protection and comfort. Hello Bello offers plant-based baby wipes made with mostly water, aloe, and chamomile. b.box offers no-spill kids' water bottle, which features a fast-flow silicone straw for easy drinking, a leakproof lid to prevent spills, and an ergonomic handle designed for tiny toddler hands.

articles.title: 51 Innovative Home Products You Never Knew Existed
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article presents a variety of new household products, including a foaming drain cleaner, a Pikk-It tool for removing tangled hair, and a hoodie hanger for closet organization. Other innovations include a water bottle organizer, picture hooks for easy wall mounting, a WD-40 pen, and a Doap bar for removing dough from hands. The article also features the KitchenAid nonstick aluminized cookie slider sheet, a convertible potty-training toilet seat and a lidded charcuterie board.

articles.title: Transform Your Laundry Routine With These Popular 14 Items
articles.summary: DedCool has transformed its scents into non-toxic detergents like Dedtergent in Xtra Milk. Affresh offers washing machine cleaning tablets, while Handy Laundry sells reusable wool dryer balls. Tyler Candle Company's Glamorous Wash laundry soap has gained popularity. Persil provides a German-made detergent powder for colored clothing.

articles.title: I Refuse to Let Nordstrom's Fall Sale End Without Stocking Up On These Haircare Products
articles.author: Danielle Jackson
articles.summary: Nordstrom is having a sale on hair care products including shampoos, styling products, hair masks, serums, and hair tools. Products include Pattern Beauty shampoo for curly hair, Olaplex Rich Hydration Mask, and Tangle Teezer brushes. T3's Featherweight Stylemax Dryer and a flat iron with ceramic plates are also featured.

articles.title: How to play Google Stadia on your phone, computer, or TV
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Google's Stadia is a cloud-based gaming platform accessible on Android phones, computers via Google Chrome, and TVs with Chromecast Ultra. Users can utilize the Stadia Controller or other popular controllers for gameplay. A Stadia Premiere bundle is available for $100 including both a controller and Chromecast Ultra.

articles.title: Xiaomi 17 Pro tipped for late September launch; to feature second screen, triple 50MP cameras
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: A brand has presented the 'Magic Back Screen' feature.

articles.title: Granderson: How media consolidation silences free speech
articles.author: LZ Granderson
articles.summary: Apple has launched its new smartphone, the iPhone 17 Pro Max, featuring an advanced telephoto lens, a large display, and improved battery life. This new model aims to address concerns about Apple lagging behind competitors in artificial intelligence.

articles.title: How media consolidation silences free speech
articles.author: LZ Granderson
articles.summary: Apple launched the iPhone 17 Pro Max, which features an advanced telephoto lens, large display, and improved battery life. The new model aims to address concerns about Apple lagging behind in artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Automate Your Cleaning: Robot Vacuum and Mop Combo on Sale
articles.author: Huff Post Canada
articles.summary: A robot vacuum and mop combo offers hands-free floor cleaning, controlled by app or voice, and suitable for various floor types. Its features include a 120-minute run time, compatibility with Alexa/Google Assistant, a three-stage filter dustbin, and sensors to prevent collisions. Users report easy setup, effective debris pickup, and convenient app control for scheduling cleaning sessions.

articles.title: The Pocket-Sized Gadget That Can Translate Any Language
articles.author: Vani Verma
articles.summary: Pocketalk S Plus and TransAl Genie G1 are popular pocket-sized language translator models available in 2025. Pocketalk S Plus supports over 80 languages and comes with global data plans, while TransAl Genie G1 includes real-time phone call translation and AI-powered conversation handling.

articles.title: How to get that gross mildew smell out of your laundry
articles.author: Consumer Reports
articles.summary: The article suggests several products to remove mildew smells from clothes, including Persil Activewear Clean, Hex Performance Laundry Detergent, Lysol Laundry Sanitizer, Clorox Laundry Sanitizer, Downy Rinse & Refresh, and Tide Clean Boost. These detergents and sanitizers are presented as potential solutions for addressing laundry odor issues, particularly in cases where clothes have been left wet for extended periods.

articles.title: If You're Tired Of Buying, Trying, And Tossing, Here Are 41 Products That'll Actually Exceed Your Expectations
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: This curated collection introduces a range of new products. It includes a Nooni tinted appleberry lip oil, Cosrx Snail Mucin Power Essence, The Saem hydrating eye stick, Elizabeth Mott eye primer and face primer, Hanalei lip treatment, and New Balance 608 V5 Cross Trainers. These products aim to improve beauty, health, and lifestyle experiences.

articles.title: Guernsey store Creaseys opens new shop 125 years after its first
articles.author: BBC News
articles.summary: Creaseys has opened a new store in Guernsey, located at the former HSBC bank site. This represents an expansion of Creaseys' services and offerings in a new location.

articles.title: Cronos: The New Dawn PS5 Physical Edition Arrives in the Americas
articles.author: Percy Tolentino
articles.summary: Bloober Team has launched a physical edition of 'Cronos: The New Dawn' for PlayStation 5 in North and South America. Distributed by Skybound Games and priced at $59.99, the physical edition includes the base game, an exclusive Traveler skin, digital supplies, and collectible stickers. The game is available at major retailers like Amazon and GameStop.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A17: Shockingly Good for the Price #TechIT
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy Z Fold 7, featuring an 8-inch main AMOLED display, a 6.5-inch cover screen, and a 200MP camera. Powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite and enhanced with Galaxy AI on Android 16 / One UI 8, the Z Fold 7 boasts a thinner, lighter design with an IP48 rating.

articles.title: New app for Kilkenny farmers!  MyAgFood.ie
articles.author: Sian Moloughney
articles.summary: The Department launched MyAgFood.ie, a new platform designed to improve online customer services by making them more accessible and efficient. MyAgFood.ie is replacing agfood.ie, but the existing platform will remain available for a limited transition period.

articles.title: Guangdong Unveils Third Batch of AI Application Scenarios Across Five Major Fields, Including Marine Economy This title captures the essence of the article by highlighting the release of AI applicatio
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Guangdong Province has introduced a third set of AI application scenarios, emphasizing the marine economy. Guangzhou is deploying 'Telebrity,' an AI-powered 'intelligent patrol' system for public safety. These initiatives aim to integrate AI technologies from research to practical applications.

articles.title: Amazon's 'great value' deal on six-pack of Fairy scent boosters that make clothes 'smell amazing'
articles.author: Kelly Ashmore
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a discount on a six-pack of Fairy Silk Tree Blossom & Jasmine In-Wash Scent Booster. The product is being sold for Â£15.30, a 24% discount from the usual Â£20.10. Customers describe the scent as long-lasting and amazing, with some using it on bedclothes and appreciating its value.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Lite takes on Apple's iPad with Â£9 deal and Â£210 freebies
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its new Android tablet, the Galaxy Tab S10 Lite. The tablet is available for purchase from Sky Mobile for Â£9, and customers receive free gifts worth almost Â£210.

articles.title: 31 Products So Great They're In A League Of Their Own
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: L'OrÃ©al Paris introduced the Elvive 8 Second Wonder Water for quick hair treatment. Ole Henriksen launched the Pout Preserve Peptide Lip Treatment known for its hydrating properties. Dazzle Dry released a Mini Kit for at-home manicures, praised for its fast-drying polish. Glamnetic launched press-on nails, convincing reviewers to skip salon visits due to their durability and cost-effectiveness.

articles.title: How Castor Oil Innovation Is Redefining Everyday Products
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: SNAG and SURI are utilizing castor oil innovation to reshape their products. This highlights a focus on sustainability and performance in everyday essentials like tights and oral care products.

articles.title: What-A-Bargain Grocery set to open in Amsterdam Sunday
articles.author: Stan Hudy
articles.summary: Brent Yager is launching What-A-Bargain Grocery in Amsterdam, offering national brand groceries, fresh produce, and dairy products. The store, located in the former NBT Bank, will operate from Tuesday to Sunday, with plans to accept EBT payments in the future.

articles.title: 28 Products With Downright Shocking Result Photos That'll Motivate You To Finally Clean Your House
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The article features various new cleaning products such as stain-removing pads, scratch remover sticks, shower sprays, and cleaning pastes designed for different household surfaces and messes. The products range from fabric defuzzers and outdoor surface wipes to specialized cleaners for grills, grout, and washing machines, all aiming to simplify and enhance cleaning routines.

articles.title: The ultimate robot vacuum guide for Irish buyers
articles.author: Kya Delongchamps
articles.summary: Roomba introduces DustCompactors, robot vacuum/mop combinations priced from â‚¬299 - â‚¬499, featuring integral compactors. Roomba also released the Plus 505 Combo Robot + AutoWash Dock, reduced to â‚¬499, while Eufy offers the OMNI C20 for â‚¬599, providing dual sweeping and mopping capabilities, and Eufy will release new Eufy E20, a LiDAR/camera robot vacuum for â‚¬350.

articles.title: Insta360 X4: Secure a $150 Savings on Amazon Without Virtual Assistant Services
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: The Insta360 X4 Standard bundle is available at a discounted price of $339.99 on Amazon, representing a 32% reduction from its original price.  The Insta360 X4 is known for capturing 8K 360-degree video and includes features like FlowState Stabilization, waterproof capabilities, and AI-powered editing tools within the Insta360 app, positioning it as a versatile option for both beginners and experienced creators. The product boasts a $150 savings on Amazon without virtual assistant services.

articles.title: Economic Watch: "Debut Economy" fuels consumption in Tianjin
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
articles.summary: Freshippo launched a new store in Tianjin featuring fresh seafood, an in-store bakery, and exclusive 'debut' products to enhance the shopping and dining experience. DJI & Hasselblad also opened their first store in the city, showcasing DJI's latest drones with an immersive experience zone, blending technology and art for consumers.

articles.title: "Debut Economy" fuels consumption in Tianjin
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
articles.summary: Freshippo opened its first store in Tianjin featuring fresh seafood counters, an in-store bakery, and exclusive "debut" products. DJI & Hasselblad launched their first store in the city, offering an immersive experience zone to showcase DJI's latest drones. These openings represent the "debut economy" initiative in Tianjin, designed to enhance consumption by bringing together premium brands and new business formats.

articles.title: Netweb Tech bags â‚¹450 crore AI supercomputing order for Tyrone GPU Systems
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: An order has been placed for the flagship Tyrone AI GPU.
